about.content:
About Me

I'm a systems developer who loves building fast, minimal software. I spend most of my time working on:

  • Distributed systems
  • Performance optimization
  • Low-level programming

When I'm not coding, you'll find me reading technical papers or tinkering with new tools.

Background

I've been programming for over 10 years, primarily in Go, Rust, and C. I believe in writing simple, maintainable code that does one thing well.

contact.content:
Contact

Feel free to reach out:

  • Email: hello@example.com
  • GitHub: github.com/username
  • Twitter: @username

I'm always happy to chat about systems programming, performance optimization, or interesting technical problems.

projects.content:
Projects

Here are some things I've built:

Verso

A minimal static site generator written in Go. Features:

  • Markdown with frontmatter support
  • Live reloading dev server
  • Zero configuration needed

Other Work

  • fast-cache: In-memory LRU cache with TTL support
  • logparse: High-performance log parser for nginx logs
  • netmon: Network monitoring tool with Prometheus integration
